#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# This file is automatically generated. All manual edits will be lost.
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# CMakeLists.txt for the NI-SWITCH Metadata
#---------------------------------------------------------------------

list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake")
include(GenerateGrpcSources)
include(GenerateServices)

set(metadata_files
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/attributes.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/attributes_addon.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/config.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/config_addon.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/enums.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/enums_addon.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/functions.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/functions_addon.py
  ${metadata_dir}/niswitch/__init__.py
)

set(output_files
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_client.cpp
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_client.h
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_library_interface.h
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_library.cpp
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_library.h
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_mock_library.h
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch.proto
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_service.cpp
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_service.h
)

GenerateGrpcSources(
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch.proto
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/
  ${proto_srcs_dir}/niswitch.pb.cc
  ${proto_srcs_dir}/niswitch.pb.h
  ${proto_srcs_dir}/niswitch.grpc.pb.cc
  ${proto_srcs_dir}/niswitch.grpc.pb.h
)

GenerateServices(
  niswitch
  ${metadata_files}
  ${output_files}
)

add_library(niswitch_service
  ${proto_srcs_dir}/niswitch.pb.cc
  ${proto_srcs_dir}/niswitch.grpc.pb.cc
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_client.cpp
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_library.cpp
  ${service_output_dir}/niswitch/niswitch_service.cpp
  ${custom_dir}/niswitch_service.custom.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(niswitch_service
  ni_grpc_device_server_core
  ${_GRPC_GRPCPP}
  ${CMAKE_DL_LIBS}
)

if(WIN32)
  target_link_libraries(niswitch_service 
    Delayimp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../imports/lib/win64/niswitch.lib
  )
  target_link_options(niswitch_service 
    INTERFACE
      "/DELAYLOAD:niswitch_64.dll"
  )
endif()

target_include_directories(niswitch_service
  PUBLIC 
    ${proto_srcs_dir} 
  PRIVATE
    "./"
  INTERFACE
    "../"
)
